parameter-group.name: thermostatTargetHeatingCooling
parameter-group.label: Thermostat targetHeatingCooling mapping
parameter-group.description: String values used by your thermostat to set different targetHeatingCooling modes

parameter-group.name: thermostatCurrentHeatingCooling
parameter-group.label: Thermostat currentHeatingCooling mapping
parameter-group.description: String values used by your thermostat to set different targetHeatingCooling modes

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Port
parameter.description: Defines the port the HomeKit integration listens on.

parameter.name: pin
parameter.label: Pin
parameter.description: Defines the pin, used for pairing, in the form ###-##-###.

parameter.name: networkInterface
parameter.label: Network Interface
parameter.description: Defines the IP address of the network interface to expose the HomeKit integration on.

parameter.name: useFahrenheitTemperature
parameter.label: Use Fahrenheit Temperature
parameter.description: Defines whether or not to direct HomeKit clients to use fahrenheit temperatures instead of celsius.

parameter.name: thermostatTargetModeCool
parameter.label: Cool Value
parameter.description: Word used to set the target heatingCoolingMode to COOL (if a thermostat is defined).

parameter.name: thermostatTargetModeHeat
parameter.label: Heat Value
parameter.description: Word used to set the target heatingCoolingMode to HEAT (if a thermostat is defined).

parameter.name: thermostatTargetModeAuto
parameter.label: Auto Value
parameter.description: Word used to set the target heatingCoolingMode to AUTO (if a thermostat is defined).

parameter.name: thermostatTargetModeOff
parameter.label: Off Value
parameter.description: Word used to set the target heatingCoolingMode to OFF (if a thermostat is defined).

parameter.name: thermostatCurrentModeHeating
parameter.label: Heating Value
parameter.description: Value for setting target heatingCoolingCurrentMode to HEAT (IE: indicating that the heater is currently warming the home).

parameter.name: thermostatCurrentModeCooling
parameter.label: Cooling Value
parameter.description: Value for setting target heatingCoolingCurrentMode to COOL (IE: indicating that the air condition is currently cooling the home).

parameter.name: thermostatCurrentModeOff
parameter.label: Off Value
parameter.description: Value for setting target heatingCoolingCurrentMode to OFF (IE: the hvac is currently idle, because the target temperature has been reached per the mode).
